metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare - The Web Performance & Security Company
metaTags.metaDescription: Here at Cloudflare, we make the Internet work the way it should. Offering CDN, DNS, DDoS protection and security, find out how we can help your site.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare is a Leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant™ for WAAP
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in the 2022 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Web Application and API Protection (WAAP) report.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare is a Leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant™ for WAAP
imageAssetFile.title: Gartner MQ Hero

relatedBlades.title: Turn economic uncertainty into opportunity. Regain control with Cloudflare.

features.title: A step-by-step roadmap to Zero Trust architecture
features.description: Zero Trust is within reach when you have the right plan. Read our guide to understand the process, teams and tools to get you there.

features.title: Cloudflare CASB: Securing the widening SaaS landscape
features.description: Join us to see a live demo and hear how Cloudflare CASB helps you gain visibility and control over file sharing, user access, and Shadow IT.

features.title: 2022 Q2 DDoS attack report
features.description: Latest insights and trends about the DDoS threat landscape - as observed across the global Cloudflare network.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare helps you turn economic uncertainty into opportunity
relatedBlades.copy:
Today organizations are facing economic uncertainty, shrinking budgets and lack of clarity on how to move their business forward. 

Cloudflare helps you regain control in this environment in three ways.

features.title: Control spending
features.description: Gain better control over spending and lower your TCO

features.title: Shrink supply chain risk
features.description: Eliminate hardware lead times and price uncertainty

features.title: Increase business flexibility
features.description: Navigate a changing business landscape with greater flexibility

featureLists.title: Application Services
featureLists.description: Secure and accelerate your apps, APIs, and websites in minutes by pointing your DNS to Cloudflare. Instantly turn on performance and security services.

featureLists.title: Zero Trust Services
featureLists.description: Stop data loss, malware and phishing with the most performant Zero Trust application access and Internet browsing solution.

features.title: Zero Trust Network Access with Private Routing

featureLists.title: Network Services
featureLists.description: Networking services to help enterprises connect, secure, and accelerate their corporate networks — without the cost and complexity of managing legacy network hardware.

featureLists.title: Developer Platform
featureLists.description: Deploy serverless code instantly across the globe to give it exceptional performance, reliability, and scale.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's SASE
relatedBlades.copy: The public Internet is becoming the new corporate network, and that shift calls for a radical reimagining of network security and connectivity. Learn how Cloudflare One makes it easy and intuitive to connect users, build branch office on-ramps, and delegate application access — often in a matter of minutes.
relatedBlades.subheadline: Cloudflare One delivers networking and security as one cloud-native architecture

relatedBlades.title: Need help getting started? Get a personalized recommendation.
Protect your Internet presence.
relatedBlades.copy:
Your website, APIs, and applications are your key channels for doing business with your customers and suppliers. As more and more shift online, ensuring these resources are secure, performant and reliable is a business imperative.

Cloudflare for Infrastructure is a complete solution to enable this for anything connected to the Internet.

imageAssetFile.altText: Security api web apps spot illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Security api web apps spot illustration

features.title: Security
features.description: Firewall, DDoS protection, rate limiting, bot management, VPN, and more.

features.title: Performance
features.description: Intelligent routing, mobile & image optimization, video, cache.

relatedBlades.title: Secure your team and devices.
relatedBlades.copy: Yesterday's static access controls – and the closed networks they relied upon for trust and verification – are no match for today's open enterprise. Cloudflare replaces legacy security perimeters with our global network, making getting work done on the Internet faster and safer for teams.

features.title: Access
features.description: Zero Trust access for all your applications (cloud, on-premise, or SaaS) without a VPN.

features.title: Gateway
features.description: Secure and inspect corporate Internet traffic, without sacrificing performance.

features.title: Browser Isolation
features.description: Run browsers in the cloud away from your networks and endpoints.

relatedBlades.title: Build globally scalable applications.
relatedBlades.copy:
The traditional model of building cloud applications requires you to set up containers and deploy to zones. Should your application or website surge in popularity, you have to manage the scaling process.

Cloudflare Workers changes that. You write the code, and we handle the rest. With serverless functions, storage at the edge, and instant static sites, you can build your applications directly onto our network.

imageAssetFile.altText: Workers apps scaling globally spot illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Workers apps scaling globally spot illustration

relatedBlades.title: Your customers are global. Why isn't your network?
relatedBlades.subtitle: Featured Stories

features.title: HubSpot
features.description: Learn how HubSpot worked hand-in-hand with Cloudflare to rapidly secure and accelerate thousands of customer domains.

features.title: LendingTree
features.description: Cloudflare helped LendingTree save over $250,000 in just 5 months and reduced Bot attacks by over 70%

features.title: Thomson Reuters
features.description: FindLaw, a Thomson Reuters business, uses Cloudflare to secure and accelerate thousands of customer sites.

navigationLinks.description: Cloudflare One partners help organizations of all sizes adopt Zero Trust solutions.

navigationLinks.description: Cloudflare Services Partners have deep expertise in SASE and Zero Trust services.

navigationLinks.description: Interested in joining our Partner Network?  Get started by applying on our Partner Portal.

navigationLinks.description: Get started by selling and supporting Cloudflare self-serve plans.

navigationLinks.title: Technology Partner Program
navigationLinks.description: Apply to become a technology partner to facilitate and drive innovative integrations that create value for our mutual customers.

navigationLinks.title: Analytics
navigationLinks.description: Use insights to tune Cloudflare and provide the best experience to your end users

navigationLinks.title: Bandwidth Alliance
navigationLinks.description: Cloud providers partner to reduce data transfer fees

navigationLinks.title: Cyber Risk
navigationLinks.description: Cloudflare partners with leading cyber insurers and incident response providers to help customers reduce their cyber risk

navigationLinks.title: Developer Platform
navigationLinks.description: Cloudflare is working with partners to provide the network, storage, and compute power to deliver apps faster and safer

navigationLinks.title: Endpoint Security
navigationLinks.description: Integrate device posture signals from endpoint security platforms

navigationLinks.title: Identity Providers
navigationLinks.description: Get frictionless authentication across provider types with Cloudflare's identity partnerships

navigationLinks.title: Network Interconnection
navigationLinks.description: Extend your network to Cloudflare over secure, high-performance links

navigationLinks.title: Mobile Device Management
navigationLinks.description: Secure endpoints for your remote workforce by deploying Cloudflare's client with MDM vendors of your choice

navigationLinks.title: Network Observability
navigationLinks.description: Enhance on-demand DDoS protection with unified network-layer security and observability
